text: Purple Wave is selling farm equipment to the highest bidders at purplewave.com. Name your price for tractors and tillage implements, combines and headers including late model lexions, sprayers and spreaders, planters and drills, drain trucks, windrowers, forage choppers, balers and much more. Bidding is open now and each of more than 200 items will sell without reserves or minimum bids on Wednesday, March 30th beginning at 10 a.m. Don't wait! Visit the newly redesigned purplewave.com to get started. Purple Wave Auction. Straight, simple, sold.
